title: The Muppets at Walt Disney World RESTORED Jim Henson Hour Muppet
description:
The Muppets at Walt Disney World RESTORED Jim Henson Hour Muppet Special

Carefully restored from VHS with special features. This will fit on a standard DVD-R if the DVD-ROM folder is removed.

The Muppets at Walt Disney World premiered on NBC on May 6, 1990 as an episode of The Magical World of Disney. It was part of an awareness campaign to promote the planned merger of The Jim Henson Company with The Walt Disney Company.

In this one-hour special, the Muppets visit Kermit's hometown of Paradise Swamp, Florida for the annual Frog Festival and Bug Fry. Once there, they discover Walt Disney World on the other side of the swamp. After a run-in with Quentin Fitzwaller, an irate, bumbling security guard played by Charles Grodin, the group splits up to explore the wonders of the theme parks and resort complex.

Songs: "Knee Deep" "Rockin' All Around the World" "Who's Your Lady Friend?" "I'm Doggin' It" "The Rainbow Connection" "Love in a Laundromat" "More, More, More"

Starring (as The Muppets) 
Jim Henson, Frank Oz, Jerry Nelson, Richard Hunt, Dave Goelz, Steve Whitmire, Kevin Clash, David Rudman, Rickey Boyd, Rick Lyon and Camille Bonora.

Special Guests Charles Grodin as Quentin Fitzwaller, Raven-SymonÃƒÂ© as herself, Wayne Allwine as Mickey Mouse (uncredited)


Executive Producer: Jim Henson
Producers: Diana Birkenfield and Martin G. Baker
Director: Peter Harris
Writer: Jerry Juhl
Musical Arrangements: Mark Radice, Phil Ramone, Larry Schwartz, Charlie Camorata, Mark Radice, Merrill and Rubicam

---

Extras (All extras are carefully restored from VHS and other sources)

Two TV Ads

TV ad and clips from Muppets Disney Live Shows
Here Come the Muppets (May 25, 1990 - September 2, 1991)
(Videophone footage of Piggy and Fozzie, guest appearances by Mickey Mouse and Lily Tomlin, and complete audio)
Muppets On Location: Days of Swine and Roses (September 16, 1991 - 1994)
(Songs: Hey a Movie, 42nd Street, Lullaby of Broadway, Happy Feet, Everything's Coming Up Roses)

[See DVD-ROM extras for more from the Live Shows, including several full recordings and one of Muppetvision 3D.]

"Muppets at Walt Disney World" Outtakes (low quality)

Jim Henson with Jane Pauley, The Today Show, April 14, 1989
(With intro from MSNBC Time & Again)

The Today Show 1984: Jim Henson, Kermit the Frog, Gene Shalit, Willard Scott

Jim Henson and Kermit the Frog on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, 4/17/1989

Jim Henson, CBS This Morning, 4/21/1989

Jim Henson and Kermit the Frog, The Pat Sajak Show, 5/8/1989

Play Songs Only:
"Knee Deep" "Rockin' All Around the World" "Who's Your Lady Friend?" "I'm Doggin' It" "The Rainbow Connection" "Love in a Laundromat" "More, More, More"

"Here Come The Muppets" Live Show Audio

[DVD-ROM extras include photos, and video from the Disney World live shows.]
